website_summaries.verdict: High-performance basketball shoe with low profile, great support and comfortable for long term use.
pros: Mix of durable leather, mesh upper and abrasion-resistant molded rubber that absorbs impact
cons: Ankle portion loses support through time

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe that some would consider great ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes with a nice look (in my opinion). I play basketball 3 to 4 times per week. Twice per week in local city league and twice in open gym pickup games. The shoes definitely had a supportive feel with cushioned support. Nike's seem to have a thinner feel to bottom of the shoe so these are a welcome change. I would give them 5 stars but they lost that new feel around the ankle portion in rough 3 weeks. I know the pros turn their shoes over more often (easily within 30 days) but I don't think that should be required for full support.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Crump III

customer_reviews.title: are different on both shoes and looks like it was a reject pair of shoes that someone ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well, but the problem I had, was not viewable from the pictures. The way the blue meets the white, are different on both shoes and looks like it was a reject pair of shoes that someone decided to make a lot of to sell as a new trend.
customer_reviews.author: jhuffman

customer_reviews.title: great fit and style
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot great fit comfortable I bought before in the past highly recommend continue to make them
customer_reviews.author: Kreg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I got these on a huge discount and they performed very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Josh P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe...I’ve gotten a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice kicks. comfortable and wide enough in the toe ...
customer_reviews.text: nice kicks. comfortable and wide enough in the toe even for a sasquatch like me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: has good finishes, although I have been very fair
customer_reviews.text: is an attractive shoe, has good finishes, although I have been very fair, in general terms are somewhat comfortable, I hope to expand a little with the use.
customer_reviews.author: Ricon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I love how much ankle support I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I love how much ankle support I have with them.
customer_reviews.author: carl miller

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Seemingly good quality shoes. The last pair of Under Armour shoes lasted two years. I expect these will be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I didn’t read the reviews before buying these shoes. Most of the reiviews were saying that the shoes fit smaller then the size indicated. I’m a size 13 and they fit just as expected and I can say I’m satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K Boyd III

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed. Awesome color scheme
customer_reviews.text: They were a little hard for my son to get into but he is 11. He loves them. Bought specifically foe bball and they are working great. Great support. He has two pair.
customer_reviews.author: lolomommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Me
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I asked for! Comfortable, stylish, perfect for work if your job requires you to be indoor/outdoor. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Madbeldon

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but takes a while to break in. Also, don't wear low socks or you'll get blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes, love the Beast Blue
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I use them to train in the gym, plyo and sometimes box with them. My go to for any workout.
customer_reviews.author: Orlan Castillo

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect. He was thrilled when he received them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson for basketball, he loves them. They fit perfect. He was thrilled when he received them; thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Moul

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are good but size I normally use confortably in other brands ...
customer_reviews.text: I had togive it to my son. Shoes are good but size I normally use confortably in other brands is too small in this.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes !
customer_reviews.text: Great for both Basketball and Crossfit. I recommend these if you are looking for a 2 in one type of sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am Corp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes! My son was impressed & they r well made..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run really small. Now we have to pay to ship them back.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy W.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like them and use them for work and gave it ...
customer_reviews.text: Half size to small ..I wanted to like them and use them for work and gave it a few days to break in ....but the hurt my feet the look is nice tho!
customer_reviews.author: Hay Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Shoes are a bit heavy which is good and bad. They are sturdy shoes that help prevent injury but are also a bit worse for running and being light on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Prime Day Pick-up
customer_reviews.text: Great Fit, great design, and at a great Price picked them up from Amazon Prime Day for 51$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Valsetz RTS Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description: Ultra-durable fused mesh upper combined with soft leather ankle collar & quarter panels for enhanced structure & support .Asymmetric eyestays & innovative webbed lacing system create a superior lockdown fit, eliminating excess material & buckling .External TPU heel counter adds support & stability .Tough TPU overlays increase abrasion resistance .Charged Cushioningsockliner molds to the foot for a personalized fit & ideal underfoot comfort .Full-length Micro Gmidsole carriage delivers unmatched lightweight responsiveness .Charged Cushioningplaced under the heel & forefoot to absorbs impact & convert it into a responsive burst of energy .Injection TPU midsole shank fortifies stability .Multi-directional organic herringbone outsole offers maximum floor control & grip .
feature_bullets: Ultra durable fused mesh upper combined with soft leather ankle collar & quarter panels for enhanced structure & support
Asymmetric eyestays & innovative webbed lacing system create a superior lockdown fit, eliminating excess material & buckling
External TPU heel counter adds support & stability
Tough TPU overlays increase abrasion resistance
Charged Cushioning sockliner molds to the foot for a personalized fit & ideal underfoot comfort
